entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
